title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.55 - Affiliation of new york incorporated institutions with unaccredited institutions of higher education outside of new york state
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.55 - Affiliation of new york incorporated institutions with unaccredited institutions of higher education outside of new york state

State Regulations

An individual, association, copartnership or corporation in

New York which is not empowered to confer associate, baccalaureate or higher
degrees shall not offer a program leading to a degree to be conferred by an
institution, located within or outside of New York State, which is not
accredited for degree purposes by an accrediting agency recognized by the

United States Office of Education. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
3.55

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
